heading: summer sale
subheading: the wired investment portfolio as the market wilts under a summer sell-off, i refuse to join the herd. instead of selling anything, i’m going bargain-hunting. at&t, in particular, looks cheap, so i’m deploying some idle cash to buy 3,000 shares. ceo c. michael armstrong is to be commended for his broadband-savvy purchases of tci and […]
author: wired staff
